verses.verse: Then he brought me forth<WH3318> into the outer<WH2435> court<WH2691>, the way toward<WH1870> the north<WH6828>: and he brought<WH935> me into the chamber<WH3957> that was over against the separate place<WH1508>, and which was before the building<WH1146> toward the north<WH6828>.
Before<WH6440> the length<WH753> of a hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520> was the north<WH6828> door<WH6607>, and the breadth<WH7341> was fifty<WH2572> cubits<WH520>.

Over against the twenty<WH6242> cubits which were for the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691>, and over against the pavement<WH7531> which was for the outer<WH2435> court<WH2691>, was gallery<WH862> against<WH6440> gallery<WH862> in three stories<WH7992>.

And before<WH6440> the chambers<WH3957> was a walk<WH4109> of ten<WH6235> cubits<WH520> breadth<WH7341> inward<WH6442>, a way<WH1870> of one<WH259> cubit<WH520>; and their doors<WH6607> toward the north<WH6828>.

Now the upper<WH5945> chambers<WH3957> were shorter<WH7114>: for the galleries<WH862> were higher<WH398> than these<WH2007>, than the lower<WH8481>, and than the middlemost<WH8484> of the building<WH1146>.

For they were in three<WH8027> stories<WH5982>, but had not pillars as the pillars<WH5982> of the courts<WH2691>: therefore the building was separated<WH680> more than the lowest<WH8481> and the middle<WH8484> from the ground<WH776>.

And the wall<WH1447> that was outside<WH2351> over against<WH5980> the chambers<WH3957>, toward<WH1870> the outer<WH2435> court<WH2691> on the front<WH6440> of the chambers<WH3957>, the length<WH753> there was fifty<WH2572> cubits<WH520>.

For the length<WH753> of the chambers<WH3957> that were in the outer<WH2435> court<WH2691> was fifty<WH2572> cubits<WH520>: and<WH6440>, behold, before the temple<WH1964> were a hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520>.
And from under these chambers<WH3957> was the entry<WH3996> on the east side<WH6921>, as one goes<WH935> into them<WH2007> from the outer<WH2435> court<WH2691>.

The chambers<WH3957> were in the thickness<WH7341> of the wall<WH1444> of the court<WH2691> toward<WH1870> the east<WH6921>, over against<WH6440> the separate place<WH1508>, and over against<WH6440> the building<WH1146>.

And the way<WH1870> before<WH6440> them was like the appearance<WH4758> of the chambers<WH3957> which were toward<WH1870> the north<WH6828>, as long as<WH753> they<WH3651>, and as broad as they<WH4161>: and all their goings out were both according to their fashions<WH4941>, and according to their doors<WH6607>.

And according to the doors<WH6607> of the chambers<WH3957> that were toward<WH1870> the south<WH1864> was a door<WH6607> in the head<WH7218> of the way<WH1870>, even the way<WH1870> directly<WH1903> before<WH6440> the wall<WH1448> toward<WH1870> the east<WH6921>, as one enters into them<WH935>.

Then said<WH559> he unto me<WH6828>, The north chambers<WH3957> and the south<WH1864> chambers<WH3957>, which are before<WH6440> the separate place<WH1508>, they be holy<WH6944> chambers<WH3957>, where the priests<WH3548> that approach<WH7138> unto the Lord<WH3068> shall eat<WH398> the most<WH6944> holy things<WH6944>: there shall they lay<WH3240> the most<WH6944> holy things<WH6944>, and the food offering<WH4503>, and the sin offering<WH2403>, and the trespass offering<WH817>; for the place<WH4725> is holy<WH6918>.

When the priests<WH3548> enter<WH935> in it<WH3318>, then shall they not go out of the holy<WH6944> place into the utter<WH2435> court<WH2691>, but there they shall lay<WH3240> their garments<WH899> where they minister<WH8334>; for they are holy<WH6944>; and shall put<WH3847> on other<WH312> garments<WH899>, and shall approach<WH7126> to those things which are for the people<WH5971>.

Now when he had made a end<WH3615> of measuring<WH4060> the inner<WH6442> house<WH1004>, he brought me forth<WH3318> toward<WH1870> the gate<WH8179> whose prospect<WH6440> is toward<WH1870> the east<WH6921>, and measured<WH4058> it round about<WH5439>.
He measured<WH4058> the east<WH6921> side<WH7307> with the measuring<WH4060> reed<WH7070>, five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds<WH7070>, with the measuring<WH4060> reed<WH7070> round about<WH5439>.
He measured<WH4058> the north<WH6828> side<WH7307>, five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds<WH7070>, with the measuring<WH4060> reed<WH7070> round about<WH5439>.
He measured<WH4058> the south<WH1864> side<WH7307>, five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds<WH7070>, with the measuring<WH4060> reed<WH7070>.
He turned about<WH5437> to the west<WH3220> side<WH7307>, and measured<WH4058> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds<WH7070> with the measuring<WH4060> reed<WH7070>.

He measured<WH4058> it by the four<WH702> sides<WH7307>: it had a wall<WH2346> round about<WH5439>, five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds long<WH753>, and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> broad<WH7341>, to make a separation<WH914> between the sanctuary<WH6944> and the profane place<WH2455>.
